name: The Walk (itch) (drkehowler)
description:
A chill game set in a maze I made while watching codat's tutorial in making a horror maze game in Godot. Just tinkered with some things and implemented things I learned from other tutorials.

Little update:

improved map placement so player doesn't need to look down too much

made a pause option (esc key)

locked the window  (not resizable anymore because gui gets wrecked)
